chapter.title: Conclusion
chapter.para: As stated at the beginning of this document, the key goal of the EGT is to provide a way of interacting with Guvnor repository resources in a local Eclipse workspace. While clearly there is a lot more that could be done, and no doubt there will be aspects of the current tooling that require revision going forward, we feel that the current state of the EGT is sufficient for the major use cases.
If you have some questions, comments or suggestions on the topic, please feel free to ask in the Jboss Tools Forum.
